channel.title: [PI] Need some help adding Nomad
channel.description:
Okay so I followed this Tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,520563.0.html
I ended up getting 69 errors. Managed to turn 69 errors into 20 by adding a } underneath the big pile of code.
src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1573: error: cannot find symbol int wrathDamage = c.playerLevel[3]/10 * 3; ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1581: error: cannot find symbol npcs[i].forceAnim(6986);//barrage? ^ symbol: method forceAnim(int) location: class NPC src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1583: error: cannot find symbol if (c.freezeTimer <= 0){ ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1584: error: cannot find symbol c.freezeTimer = 15; ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1585: error: cannot find symbol c.gfx0(369); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1586: error: cannot find symbol c.sendMessage("You have been frozen."); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1592: error: cannot find symbol c.getPA().appendPoison(160); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1593: error: cannot find symbol c.gfx0(391); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1595: error: cannot find symbol c.sendMessage("Nomad fills your lungs with a deathly smoke."); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1600: error: cannot find symbol c.gfx0(382); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1602: error: cannot find symbol c.getPA().walkableInterface(12418); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1603: error: cannot find symbol c.sendMessage("You're encased in a unholy shadow."); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1609: error: cannot find symbol c.gfx0(377); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1610: error: cannot find symbol c.sendMessage("Nomad Saps your health an d increases his own."); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1614: error: cannot find symbol npcs[i].forceAnim(6326);//turm ^ symbol: method forceAnim(int) location: class NPC src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1623: error: cannot find symbol npcs[i].forceAnim(2259);//Wrath ^ symbol: method forceAnim(int) location: class NPC src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1624: error: cannot find symbol c.gfx0(2260); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1625: error: cannot find symbol c.playerLevel[3] -= wrathDamage; ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1626: error: cannot find symbol c.handleHitMask(wrathDamage); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1627: error: cannot find symbol c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); ^ symbol: variable c location: class NPCHandler Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 20 errors
Like that ^
So.. I wanted to make this work obviously so i looked further and i changed c.gfx0(377); into c.gfx0377; If I remember correctly. Now I ended up getting only 1 error:
src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1609: error: not a statement c.gfx0377; ^ 1 error
I'm kinda stuck there.
I tried changing c.gfx0377; to client.gfx0377; but that is the same error but them showing it as client instead of c so that didnt solve anything
Does anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: [PI] Need some help adding Nomad
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

redo the tutorial? if other players got it working you obviously did something wrong.

Read full topic
